message.content:
cs.LO, cs.AI, cs.MA, cs.GT, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with logic and reasoning about knowledge, which is a topic in the subfield of computer science known as computational logic (cs.LO). The use of epistemic formulas and announcements also suggests a connection to artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The focus on how knowledge changes after announcements could also be relevant to multi-agent systems (cs.MA) and game theory (cs.GT). Finally, the use of infinitary axiomatisation suggests a connection to mathematical logic (cs.LG).
